title: Consumer spending on mobile games in the U.S. 2014 to 2016
summary: Overall Average expenditure in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average expenditure in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, about 70.44 was reported at Year 2015
The lowest Average expenditure in U.S. dollars, of value 60.95 was reported at Year 2014
